description: Settings presets for different work styles

fast.name: Fast Mode
fast.description: Quick iterations, minimal confirmation. Best for experienced users on familiar codebases.
fast.use_case: Rapid prototyping, quick fixes, familiar codebases

thorough.name: Thorough Mode
thorough.description: Detailed explanations, careful validation. Best for learning or complex changes.
thorough.use_case: Learning new codebases, code reviews, critical systems

safe.name: Safe Mode
safe.description: Maximum guardrails. Blocks sensitive files, requires confirmation.
safe.use_case: Production systems, unfamiliar codebases, shared environments

autoformat.name: Auto-Format Mode
autoformat.description: Automatically formats code after every edit. Good for strict style enforcement.
autoformat.use_case: Teams with strict formatting rules, open source contributions
